cause.description:
Relay for Life is an annual event hosted by the American Cancer Society. Prior to this event, teams fundraise money for cancer research and services ACS provides to patients and the public. During the event, all participants come to together to celebrate the lives of those that have lost their battle to cancer and to support those that continue to fight their battle.
This year, more youth teams than ever are participating in this awesome event. Go youth teams!
1. More research brings us one step closer to a cure
2. Raising cancer awareness enables people to live healthier and longer cancer-free lives
3. We shall celebrate the lives of those that have succumbed to their battle with cancer
4. We shall empower those that continue their battle
cause.mission: To raise cancer awareness and fight for a cure.
cause.name: Relay for Life Campbell 2007
